## Introduction

To make sure packages are installed.

```{r}

cran_packages <- c(
  "BiocManager", "Seurat", "ggplot2", "scales", "patchwork", "qs",
  "hdf5r", "viridis", "scater"
)

install.packages(cran_packages)

bioc_packages <- c(
  "glmGamPoi", "scater", "SpatialExperiment"
)

BiocManager::install(bioc_packages)
```
